record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3344
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3344 -- (Senate - July 26, 2008)

[Page: S7537]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, S. 3344 is at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
The bill clerk read as follows:

A bill (S. 3344) to defend against child exploitation and child pornography through improved Internet Crimes Against Children task forces and enhanced tools to block illegal images, and to eliminate the unwanted release of convicted sex offenders.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for its second reading and object to my own request.

record.chair: The bill will be read a second time on the next legislative day.

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The bill clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
